//============================================================================
// Name        : codechef_kgp_icpc.cpp
// Author      : debasish


#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int k=1;k<=t;k++)
	{
	   int a,temp;
	   cin >> a;
	   vector <int> hm,hp;
       for(int i =0;i<a;i++)
       {
           cin >> temp;
           hm.push_back(temp);
       }
        
       for(int i =0;i<a;i++)
       {
           cin >> temp;
           hp.push_back(temp);
       }
       
        sort(hm.begin(),hm.end());
        sort(hp.begin(),hp.end());
        
        int s=0;
        for(int i =0;i<a;i++)
       {
           s+=abs(hm[i]-hp[i]);
       }
	   cout<<"Case "<<k<<": "<<s<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
